titles.title: Thanking all election officials and workers for the tireless energy and sacrifice they made to ensure that the November 2020 election ran smoothly amidst the COVID-19 pandemic.
Thanking all election officials and workers for the tireless energy and sacrifice they made to ensure that the November 2020 election ran smoothly amidst the COVID-19 pandemic.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This resolution thanks election officials and workers for their efforts to ensure that the November 2020 election ran smoothly during the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) pandemic.
